  • Method Details

    • kill

      void kill (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Kills the shop's display packets entirely.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to send the destroy packets to.

    • killAll

      void killAll()
      Kills the shop's display packets entirely for ALL players.

    • display

      void display (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, boolean showHolograms)
      Shows the shop display to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to show the display to.
      showHolograms - Whether the hologram lines are shown or not.

    • isInRange

      boolean isInRange (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, double distance)
      Checks if player is in range of this shop.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      distance - The distance between the player and the shop.
      Returns:
      Whether the player is in range or not.

    • returnBalance

      void returnBalance()
      Returns the shop's entire stored balance to the owner. If the owner does NOT exist, currency is sent to the passed player.

    • dropStock

      void dropStock()
      Drops the shop's entire stock onto the ground after calculating stacks.

    • save

      void save (boolean async)
      Saves the shop to the database.
      Parameters:
      async - Whether it should be saved on the main thread or not.

    • runCommands

      void runCommands (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, int amount)
      Runs all commands given to the shop.
      Parameters:
      player - the player used inside the commands.
      amount - The amount for the {amount} placeholder.

    • visit

      void visit (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, boolean charge)
      Attempts to teleport the passed player to this shop.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to teleport.
      charge - Whether the player should be charged.

    • delete

      void delete (boolean async)
      Deletes the shop from the database if found.
      Parameters:
      async - Whether the shop should be deleted on the main thread or not.

    • register

      void register()
      Registers the shop into the manager.

    • unRegister

      void unRegister()
      Unregisters the shop from the manager.

    • isAdminShop

      boolean isAdminShop()
      Gets if a shop is an admin shop or not.
      Returns:
      Whether the shop is admin or not.

    • makeAdminShop

      void makeAdminShop()
      Sets the owner to null to initiate admin shop mode.

    • updateTimeStamp

      void updateTimeStamp()
      Updates the shop change time stamp (Used for the purge system).

    • updateTransactionTimeStamp

      void updateTransactionTimeStamp (@NotNull @NotNull EconomyCallType economyCallType)
      Updates the shop buy or sell time stamp (Used for the dynamic price changing system). (Note: Only use BUY or SELL as the economy call type. Defaults to BUY if invalid or improper.)

    • isReadyForPurge

      boolean isReadyForPurge (int purgeDuration)
      Checks if the shop is ready to be purged.
      Parameters:
      purgeDuration - The duration a shop must be untouched.
      Returns:
      Whether it is ready.

    • isReadyForDynamicReset

      boolean isReadyForDynamicReset (int resetDuration, @NotNull @NotNull EconomyCallType economyCallType)
      Checks if the shop is ready to have its dynamic price counter reset for either BUY or SELL.
      Parameters:
      resetDuration - The duration a shop must go without a transaction in the BUY or SELL field.
      economyCallType - The type to check readiness for (Note: ONLY use BUY or SELL, by default BUY will be used).
      Returns:
      Whether it is ready.

    • purge

      void purge (boolean async)
      Deletes the shop's data, deletes the base-block, drops the stock, destroys the display packet, and unregisters the object.
      Parameters:
      async - Whether the file deletion is async or not.

    • getDynamicPriceValue

      double getDynamicPriceValue (double originalPrice, boolean isBuy)
      Gets the dynamic price that will be added/subtracted to the buy/sell price.
      Parameters:
      originalPrice - The original price.
      isBuy - Determines whether the result will use buy or sell values.
      Returns:
      The dynamic value that will

    • canEdit

      boolean canEdit (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Checks to see if the player is able to edit the shop.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check access for.
      Returns:
      Whether the player can or can NOT edit the shop.

    • getBuyPrice

      double getBuyPrice (boolean useDynamicPricing)
      Gets the shop's unit buy price.
      Parameters:
      useDynamicPricing - Whether to apply dynamic price values to the base value or not.
      Returns:
      The total result.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The total result.

    • setStoredBalance

      void setStoredBalance (double amount)
      Sets the balance of a shop. This balance is used to purchase and store currency collected from investors.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to set as the stored balance.
